data.actual_result: Numbers appear cut off at the top
data.expected_result: Numbers are not cut off at the top
data.short_description: Numbers such as 9 and 2 in a user discriminator appear cut off at the top in audit log entries on light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can view the audit log - Have a user with a number with a loop at the top in their discriminator create an audit log entry - Switch your theme to light theme, and enter the audit log in server settings - Observe the discriminator in the audit log entry - Switch your appearance to dark theme, and view the entry again
